mapper.select: SELECT '0' AS CHK , T2.PD_CD , T2.PD_CD AS CODE , T2.PD_CD ||' '|| T2.PD_NM AS CODE_NAME , T2.PD_NM AS NM_KOR , T3.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD /* 품목종류코드 */ , T3.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD /* 상품그룹코드 */ , T2.PD_HCLSF_ID , T2.PD_TP_CD , ST108.OTSC_DV_CD /* 아웃소싱구분코드 */ , ST108.LNC_STRTDT /* 출시시작일자 */ , ST108.LNC_EXDT /* 출시만기일자 */ FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 /*상품기본*/ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T3 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T2.PD_CD = T3.PD_CD AND T3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN TB_SVST_NWPRD_M3_LNC_IZ ST108 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T2.PD_CD = ST108.PD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND T3.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' AND T3.PD_PRP_VAL32 = 'Y' ORDER BY T2.PD_CD
mapper.update: DELETE FROM TB_SVST_NWPRD_M3_LNC_IZ /* 신상품M3 출시내역 */ WHERE PD_CD = #{pdCd} /* 상품코드 */

UPDATE TB_SVST_NWPRD_M3_LNC_IZ SET LNC_STRTDT = #{lncStrtdt} /*출시시작일자 */ , LNC_EXDT = #{lncExdt} /*출시만기일자 */
WHERE PD_CD = #{pdCd}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.PD_CD AS CD , TRIM(T1.PD_ABBR_NM) AS CD_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS SVPD_ITEM_GR , T1.PD_HCLSF_ID AS PD_HCLSF_ID /* 상품대분류 */ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D T3 ON T1.IMG_APN_FILE_ID = T3.ATTH_DOC_ID AND T3.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T3.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T1.PD_CD ASC
